title: Commands create new data dirs in subdirectories instead of finding project root
description: When running issues/sessions from a subdirectory, Path.cwd() causes new .issues/.sessions folders to be created there instead of finding existing ones at project root.

content: Solution: Walk up directory tree with layered resolution - CLI --root arg > SKILL_ISSUES_ROOT env var > find existing .issues/.sessions > find .git > fallback to cwd

reason: Implemented find_project_root() with walk-up resolution, converted store constants to lazy functions, added --root CLI arg to both commands
